onboarding.welcomeMessage: Practice a language. Or practice another language in exchange for your language.
onboarding.fillInAllFields: Fill in all fields to create your account.
onboarding.firstNameDescription: Your first name will be visible to other Chatati's
onboarding.lastNameDescription: Only the first letter of your last name will be visible to other Chatati's
onboarding.emailDescription: Other Chatati's do NOT see your email address. This information is only shared when matched.
onboarding.welcomeBackMessage: We're glad to see you again! Please sign in to continue practicing languages.
onboarding.forgotPasswordLink: If you forgot your password click here.
onboarding.resetTokenMissing: Reset token is missing. Please request a new password reset link.
onboarding.resetTokenInvalid: This password reset link is invalid or has expired.
onboarding.resetTokenExpired: This password reset link has expired. Please request a new one.
onboarding.resetPasswordError: An error occurred while resetting your password. Please try again.
onboarding.emailNotFound: Email not found. Please check your email and try again.
onboarding.forgotPasswordError: An error occurred while sending the password reset link. Please try again.
onboarding.invalidCredentials: Invalid credentials. Please check your email and password and try again.
onboarding.newUserProfileMessage: Please complete your profile to start using Chatati.

validation.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters long.
validation.passwordUppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter.
validation.passwordNumber: Password must contain at least one number.
validation.firstNameInvalid: Please provide a valid first name.
validation.lastNameInvalid: Please provide a valid last name.
validation.nativeLangsRequired: At least one native language is required.
validation.imageTooLarge: Image is too large. Please use an image smaller than 5MB.
validation.imageInvalidType: Please select a valid image file (JPG, PNG, or WebP).
validation.imageTooSmall: Image is too small. Please use an image at least 200x200 pixels.
validation.imageTooLargeDimensions: Image dimensions are too large. Please use an image smaller than 10000x10000 pixels.
validation.imageCorrupted: This image file appears to be corrupted. Please try a different image.
validation.imageProcessingError: Failed to process image. Please try again.
validation.imageLoadError: Failed to load image. Please try again.
validation.messageTooShort: Message must be at least 10 characters.
validation.messageTooLong: Message must be at most 400 characters.
validation.genericError: Something went wrong. Please try again.

editProfile.bioPlaceholder: Write a short bio about yourself...
editProfile.genderDescription: Select your gender. Chatati's can filter by gender. Choose Private if you don't want to share your gender.
editProfile.birthDateDescription: Your exact age is not shown on your profile. Used to filter by age category.
editProfile.nativeLangsDescription: Which languages do you speak (approximately) perfectly and can you offer to a Chatati?
editProfile.learningLangsDescription: Which languages would you like to learn? (if you only want to teach, you don't need to fill this in)
editProfile.districtDescription: Select the district where you live
editProfile.preferenceDistrictDescription: Select the districts where you prefer to meet
editProfile.genericError: Something went wrong, please try again

contact.title: Contact another Chatati
contact.description: Send a short message to introduce yourself and explain why you would like to practice together.
contact.descriptionMessageBox: Share something about yourself, your language goals and when you are usually available.
contact.contactInformation: If {firstName} accepts your invitation, you will both receive eachother's email address automatically. If {firstName} doesn't accept your invitation, nothing will be shared.
contact.alreadyContacted: You have already contacted this user.

invitations.title: Invitations
invitations.noUnanswered: You currently have no unanswered invitations.
invitations.noSentYet: You have not sent any invitations yet.
